parameters.name: fields
parameters.description:
Fields is for selecting the specific fields that you can choose by multiples to show in the response using a string with a comma delimiter.
**Example:** `name,fields,organizationId`

parameters.name: _id
parameters.description:
Unique identifier for the data that generated by system.
**Example**: `640a45dd089dc95a0a09ef14`

patch.summary: Update partially data type by ID

parameters.name: _id
parameters.description:
Unique identifier for the data that generated by system.
**Example**: `640a45dd089dc95a0a09ef14`

parameters.name: _id
parameters.description:
Unique identifier for the data type that generated by system.
**Example**: `640a45dd089dc95a0a09ef14`

fields.description:
List of fields to data type .
**Example**:
`{`
`'id': 'dataId',`
`'title': 'Data ID',`
`'type': 'text',`
`'optionData': [],`
`'required': true,`
`'primaryKey': true`
`}`

optionData.description:
Option Data of field. Field only exist, if *type* is **option**
**Example**: `['minimarket','supermarket','vending machine','warung']`

required.description:
Flag that mark field as required or not.
**Example**: `true`

limitUser.description:
Setting to limit data source usage by users.
**Default**: `false`

commonData.description:
Settings to define the data source to be unique by hub or shared across all hubs. This setting is not changeable after creation.
**Default**: `false`

fields.description:
List of fields to data type .
**Example**:
`{`
`'id': 'dataId',`
`'title': 'Data ID',`
`'type': 'text',`
`'optionData': [],`
`'required': true,`
`'primaryKey': true`
`}`

optionData.description:
Option Data of field. Field only exist, if *type* is **option**
**Example**: `['minimarket','supermarket','vending machine','warung']`

required.description:
Flag that mark field as required or not.
**Example**: `true`

deleteFields.description:
This parameter is list of fields to data type id for delete the field on collection of data source.
**Example**:
`[`
`'outletPhoneNumber',`
`'outletCloseOrder'`
`]`

limitUser.description:
Setting to limit data source usage by users.
**Default**: `false`

List of fields to data type .
**Example**:
`{`
`'id': 'dataId',`
`'title': 'Data ID',`
`'type': 'text',`
`'optionData': [],`
`'required': true,`
`'primaryKey': true`
`}`

required.description:
